member.name: P:Litium.Extensions.Data.IPageable`1.SupportsSortColumn
member.summary: Whether this IPageble collection supports sorting the result on a sortcolumn.
member.example: You have a table of Persons, each row has a column named Name and LastName. If the API supports sorting on for example LastName, SupportsSortColumn will be true and you can pass "LastName" as value on the sortColumn parameter on the GetPage method.
member.value: "true" if this IPageble collection supports sorting the result on a sortcolumn

member.name: P:Litium.Extensions.Data.IPageable`1.SupportsSortOrder
member.summary: Whether this IPageble collection supports sorting the result in Ascending or Descending order.
member.example: When calling the GetPage method one of the parameters is SortOrder, this property indicates if the method supports sorting on sort order or not.
member.exception: If you pass other than UNDEFINED as parameter and SupportsSortOrder is false an NotSupportedException will be trown

member.summary: Whether this IPageble collection supports sorting the result in Ascending or Descending order.

member.value: "true" if this IPageble collection supports sorting the result on a sortcolumn

member.name: P:Litium.Extensions.ObjectPost.ObjectPostCollection.SupportsSortOrder
member.summary: Whether this IPageble collection supports sorting the result in Ascending or Descending order.
member.example: When calling the GetPage method one of the parameters is SortOrder, this property indicates if the method supports sorting on sort order or not.
member.exception: If you pass other than UNDEFINED as parameter and SupportsSortOrder is false an NotSupportedException will be trown
